name: Build and Grow
description:
Build&Grow - minimalistic city-builder with calm gameplay and atmosphere created to make player relax.

Gameplay Feature:
  The player needs to build on a piece of land with buildings that are given to the player in a random order to accumulate score points needed to expand the map.
  The principle of synergy: each building gains additional score points from installing it with some buildings, and loses score points from installing it with others.
  For example: building a park next to a house will add more score points than building a park and a house separately, and building a house next to a mine will add less score points than building a house and a mine separately.

Duration:
An average gaming session is approximately 30 minutes.

Some FAQs:

Do I plan to upload the game to Steam?
Yes, if the necessary funds are collected, the game will appear in steam, play market and, possibly, on other platforms.

How much will it cost?
1.5$ at all platforms (itch.io, steam, play market and etc.), no more.

If I buy the game here, can I get the key from it on other platforms?
Yes, as soon as the game is released on another platform.

4. Make mobile version;
From this stage, the game can be uploaded to the Steam and Play market.
It depends on the funds raised.
5. Add online leaderboard;
6. More ambient soundtracks;

9. There are still enough plans, but who knows what will happen next c:

If I pay now, will I be able to access the latest version of the game at the moment?
Yes, if you buy a game, then add it to your library, which means that it will already be yours.

Does the game have a demo version?
Of course, you can download the demo version of the game right now, for free.
If something in the demo version is clumsy, do not pay attention, it will be fixed very soon.
